events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like a refund immediately. The product is not what I paid for.
The customer's request has been categorized under Refund due to their concerns about receiving an incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to Agent Maria, who specializes in order discrepancies and refund processing.
Hello, I’m Maria. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a picture of the item you received so I can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 54321 and attached is a photo clearly showing the incorrect product I received.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund for your order and send you a prepaid return label to send back the incorrect item.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick help. I appreciate you resolving this so fast.
The refund has been initiated and you should receive confirmation within 3-5 business days. The return label has also been emailed to you.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and whether there is anything else I can assist you with.
Since the refund was successfully processed and the customer has no further questions, we are closing this case now.
